name: The Resuscitation Bay
description:
This game is designed to demonstrate the functional principles of the cardiovascular system, and how we can modify elements of it them with vasoactive drugs, and fundamentals of ABC's and ACLS. 

Be a shock detective to figure out the problem then pick the right drugs to fix it. Try to not to let the patient code too often on the way!  

A review of the drugs and disease encountered in this game can be found here!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6biq9waR4dY&t=2310s
